thread.title: Two-bed flat with a ‘garden’ and on-street parking becomes one of UK’s cheapest properties after going on sale for just £17,000
thread.title_full: Two-bed flat with a ‘garden’ and on-street parking becomes one of UK’s cheapest properties after going on sale for just £17,000

author: yjeffery
title: Two-bed flat with a ‘garden’ and on-street parking becomes one of UK’s cheapest properties after going on sale for just £17,000
text:
Opinion BRITAIN'S CHEAPEST HOME? Two-bed flat with a ‘garden’ and on-street parking becomes one of UK’s cheapest properties after going on sale for just £17,000 
Bargain flat is located near Scotland's biggest shopping centre, has great transport links & is the cheapest on sale in Glasgow BY YASMIN JEFFERY
